an5.210:4.1: “Mendicants, there are these five drawbacks of falling asleep unmindful and unaware.
an5.210:4.3: You sleep badly and wake miserably. You have bad dreams. The gods don’t protect you. And you emit semen.
an5.210:4.4: These are the five drawbacks of falling asleep unmindful and unaware.
an5.210:5.1: There are these five benefits of falling asleep mindful and aware.
an5.210:5.3: You sleep well and wake happily. You don’t have bad dreams. The gods protect you. And you don’t emit semen.
an5.210:5.4: These are the five benefits of falling asleep mindful and aware.”
